vitejte prihlaste se: Welcome! Log into your account please.
byl jste automaticky odhlasen: Your authentication has expired, you were automatically logged out.
opravdu si prejete smazat cvik s nazvem: Would you really like to delete the exercise named
opravdu si prejete smazat tento zaznam?: Would you really like to delete this record?
nemate zadne zaznamy: You don't have any records yet. Add some please.
nemate zadne cviky: You don't have any exercises yet. Add some please
musi mit pozadavky hesla: The password must be atleast 8 characters long, must contain at least one capital letter, one small leter and one number. It must not countain any special characters.
hesla se neshoduji: The submited passwords do not match

errors.neco se nepovedlo: Something went wrong, please try again.
errors.User with this email already exists: User with this e-mail already exists
errors.Not existing user: User with the submited parameters does not exist.
errors.Wrong password: You have submited a wrong password.
